G

GameDialog<dialog> - Class in gui
Title: GameDialog Description: class which could be either a GameOver dialog or a Winner because it has a generic type.
GameDialog(dialog) - Constructor for class gui.GameDialog
Constructor which takes a JDialog and instantiates a new game dialog by assigning it to the generic object defined before.
GameFrame - Class in gui
Title: GameFrame Description: class which organizes the GUI of the application.
GameFrame() - Constructor for class gui.GameFrame
Constructor without parameters which instantiates a new game frame.
GameOver - Class in gui
Title: GameOver Description: class which creates a new frame when the player doesn't win.
GameOver() - Constructor for class gui.GameOver
Constructor without parameters which instantiates a new game over dialog.
GamePanel - Class in gui
Title: GamePanel Description: class which displays the words in order to play.
GamePanel() - Constructor for class gui.GamePanel
Constructor without parameters which instantiates a new game panel.
getAscissa() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Called on an instance of a StringWord gets the x-axis.
getClip() - Method in class listeners.MusicButton
Gets the audio clip.
getDialog() - Method in class gui.GameDialog
Gets the dialog.
getEliminate() - Method in class listeners.GPListener
Gets the eliminate words.
getFrame() - Static method in class main.Main
Method which returns the refecence to the main frame GameFrame
getGP() - Method in class gui.GameFrame
Gets the game panel (north).
getGPL() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Gets the GPL.
getIndex() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Gets the number of words in game minus one.
getLabelSelected(int) - Method in class gui.GameFrame
If i is 1 gets the label typed, else gets the label punteggio.
getLevel() - Method in class word.WordManager
Gets the current level of game.
getMusic() - Method in class gui.GameFrame
Gets the music button.
getOrdinata() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Called on an instance of a StringWord gets the y-axis.
getParole(int) - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Gets the word at index i.
getPunti() - Method in class listeners.GPListener
Gets the score for displaying it in the right label.
getSelected() - Method in class word.StringWord
Indicates that the word drawn is selected or not.
getVolume() - Method in class gui.GameFrame
Gets the actual volume.
getWord() - Method in class word.StringWord
Gets the word.
getWordManager() - Method in class gui.GamePanel
Gets the word manager reference associated with the game panel.
getX() - Method in class word.StringWord
Gets the x-axis of the word drawn.
getY() - Method in class word.StringWord
Gets the y-axis of the word drawn.
GPListener - Class in listeners
Title: GPListener Description: The listener interface for receiving GamePanel events.
GPListener(GamePanel) - Constructor for class listeners.GPListener
Instantiates a new GP listener.
